website_summaries.verdict: A light, fast-drying self-tanning mousse that's easy to use even if you've never done self-tanning before.
pros: Lightweight mousse that is easy to apply
Tan builds up gradually with use for a natural look
cons: A few have complained that it left stains on their clothes

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I have used many tanning lotions drugstore and high end and this continues to be my favorite. When applied correctly it never leaves me orange or streaky, it has a green tent which creates gorgeous color. It is very expensive but it is worth it to me. I have fair-ish skin and think it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: amy faulkner

customer_reviews.title: ... it would rub off on my clothes (not a good look). But with a vacation coming up
customer_reviews.text: I tend to not use self tanners because I've had issues in the last where it would rub off on my clothes (not a good look). But with a vacation coming up, and super pale skin, I wanted to try SOMETHING, and the reviews for this were pretty good. This product was great! Follow the instructions and it was a very nice subtle tan. I've repeated about every 7-9 days to maintain. No residue left on my clothes or my sheets.
customer_reviews.author: With Grace

customer_reviews.title: Best Self-Tanner Out There!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite self-tanner I have ever used. I have used MANY different kinds, and this brand far exceeds expectations. It is the most real looking tan and has absolutely no hint of "orange". I put it on either the day or night before an event and shower in the morning. Excess washes off in the shower and you are left with the perfect sun-kissed tan. I have purchased this product over 5 times, and have had no issues with it. I have recommended this self-tanner to over 20 people and receive frequent compliments. No one can tell it's fake tanner. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: SHARON442

customer_reviews.title: Tan in a bottle. Easy application
customer_reviews.text: This self tanner is easy to apply and a beautiful color. I love the fact that the mousse is light making the application very easY to apply. You have a little playtime before it dries down. I don’t think that the smell is bad compared to other self Tanners. I layered it after one day and it did make me darker. I also have no streaks. I have all of skin but I am on the ferry fare side. As you can see in the photo, my hand is fairly white compared to my wrist. Also, purchase a mitt if you don’t have one. I have used tanceuticals, and I feel like the coloring is very comparable
customer_reviews.author: thtbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Itchy, hot, angry rash.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this out, did everything according to the directions. Exfoliate, moisturize, test patch. The works. Put it on over night, woke up the next morning covered in itchy, hot, red rash all over my neck, chest, and arms. Luau party is at my house Sunday, so hopefully it's fine by then and I can figure out how to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher hurton

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied, product was easy to use (I did google ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you have blemishes or age spots - see photo - after process they will appear even more noticeable. I hadn’t thought of that. Overall satisfied, product was easy to use (I did google a video on utube to watch application before I used the product which was helpful.)
customer_reviews.author: L Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as in stores
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what’s going on with this bottle compared to those in stores. But the ones purchased from Sephora or Ulta are so much better it’s incredible. This one hardly tans. Doesn’t last. And it’s at the same price point. Not sure why the formula would differ based upon the seller - but go in store. Don’t judge this amazing product based off this bottle. This stuff is seriously the best after years of use!! - just not from here.
customer_reviews.author: nick l.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used lots of different self-tanners and have always had difficulty with becoming a streaky orange color. I was hesitant about buying this because of the price; however, I am happy to report that this is by far the best self-tanner I have tried. Do moisturizer your skin the days before and use a mitt for an even application! The results are beautiful! The color is a gorgeous and natural bronze.
customer_reviews.author: Barceline

customer_reviews.title: It gave me a rash!  :-O
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! BUT, I developed a rash from using it. I didn't want to believe it was the self tanner because I love how well it works, the evenness, the color, etc. But every time I'd use this self tanner again, I would get this rash on my legs, arms, back, all over. This was just my experience, but BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonwoman

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never gotten a rash from a self tanner before!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different types of self tanners for over a decade and thought I would branch out and try this one because it came highly recommended but it gave me a terrible rash! I do not have sensitive skin and have never had a reaction to another self tanner before. I followed all the directions and woke up this morning with little red itchy bumps all over! It’s been 24 hours and they have still not gone away. Save yourself the money and the itchiness and go with the nutritive self tanner which is what I used before trying the St Tropez!
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Unless you're the color of chalk, forget this product.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews, I was excited to try this despite the price. I ride horses, so my legs are covered while my face, arms, and shoulders tan. Despite following the thorough instructions of the first reviewer, I've used this product three times and only succeeded in taking the glare off my white legs. I really expected more--maybe at least a golden tone? So, powder white, my legs shall remain. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. It is ORANGE
customer_reviews.text: I have used MANY different tanning products and I have to say this is my lest favorite. First the positives - it is easy to apply and does not smell. While very expensive, a little goes a long way and this bottle should last a very long time. My only complaint, that it is orange. My favorite self tanner has been st.moritz and have been very happy with it but have read that st.tropez was better. This is absolutely not true. St.tropez looks so fake and so orange that I will probably just throw this out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N.

customer_reviews.title: I always come back to this brand
customer_reviews.text: So many tanners; so few that are actually great but this one is. Great natural looking tan (with no orange overtones) and most importantly- this does not have that self tanner smell. It fades evenly- not blotchy at all. And lasts 5-7 days easily. This is the best there is and I've tried other expensive brands. I always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Vespucci

customer_reviews.title: Turns green!
customer_reviews.text: I used this tanner once and it was awesome. I went to use it a second time two days later and it was a horrible putrid green. I googled if this has happened before and sure enough, several people have had this issue. St Tropez claims that if the product gets hot it will do that. My bottle did not get hot in between the two applications so not sure if that’s correct. I’ll be getting my money back for this bottle! Buyer BewAre!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. I’ve used a lot of self tanners and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I’ve used a lot of self tanners and had professional spray tans trying to get that sun kissed glow without the skin damage and this is my all time favorite. You have to take your time to put it on so you don’t have streaking but you’ll have to do that with any fake tanner and this one blends the best. It’s not super dark which I like, and if you do mess up it’s ok because it’s gone in a few days. Definitely purchase the applicator mitt to go with it. I watched a couple application videos on YouTube and I am just over the moon with this product!!! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Durbin

customer_reviews.title: only self-tanner that doesn't make me look like an oompa loompa
customer_reviews.text: Great product as far as the result. Easy to apply, dries relatively quickly, and most importantly: it actually works!! It's honestly fairly idiot-proof as far as the application. Even if you mess up a little, it won't result in uneven skintone or streakiness, which is a plus for someone like me. I also have fair skin and this is the ONLY self-tanner that doesn't make me look orange.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Amazinggggg!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write product reviews, but I feel like I had to for this one. While it is a little pricier than other tanners, it's definitely worth the cost. It has a perfect olive undertone, doesn't have a harsh chemical smell, isn't streaky whatsoever, and lasts for a decent amount of time! I apply about once a week and my tan looks super smooth & natural! The bottle is also fairly large, so overall it's well worth the price you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Rash and odor
customer_reviews.text: Broke out in a very itchy rash all over my legs! It doesn't smell like normal self tanners as you apply it but after a couple of hours it definitely does!! A majority of the color comes off when you shower. Yes I waited the 8 hours. Its just not as described. I looked orange too. So sad about the rash more than anything. My legs are still a mess more than a week later. The only good thing I can say is it is true that it doesnt look streaky.
customer_reviews.author: skc

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best self tanner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best self tanner I have ever used. I cant recommend this enough. I have a red tone to my skin and it is hard to tan. This is the least orange out of all the tanners I have tried. And I love the foam! I can walk out the house after 20 min of applying and have a light smell of self tan for the 8 hours it is processing. I receive so many compliments about my glow. I don't have the heart to tell anyone its fake :)
customer_reviews.author: Candice Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Just go straight to Sephora
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and have always purchased it at Sephora, but when I saw it was sold here on Amazon I bought it so I could get the Prime shipping. Just don’t bother. I ordered one bottle and when I pumped it out into my mitt, it was GREEN. Not brown like it usually is when purchased at Sephora. I thought maybe it was just the bottle I got so I requested a replacement and the replacement bottle was also green. Don’t waste your time. Just go to Sephora :/
customer_reviews.author: agalexander0629

customer_reviews.title: Streaks... transfers onto EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.text: In this case you don't exactly get what you pay for. I've been using self tanner for 15+ years and this, although expensive and for some reason highly recommended, isn't any better than the Neutrogena foam bronzer. If you apply this make sure you have an entire day free to roam around without clothes and be sure to shower before wearing ANYTHING or sleeping on any light colored sheets. This transfers onto everything. Once you shower, what's left over is OKAY, as long as you applied it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: brittaford

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I ordered a small size the first time I used st. Tropez bc I was new to self tanning and then this was an easy purchase bc it is so easy to use and doesn't turn you orange. I use a lot when I use it, more than the bottle says but a little bottle went a long way so I imagine this bottle will go even further and give me lots of uses. Price of one spray tan is about the same as this whole bottle and I think this looks more natural and fades more gradually and evenly then spray tans do! Get it! You won't regret it :)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Allison

customer_reviews.title: ... days before dance competitions to give my daughter a good tan on stage
customer_reviews.text: We used this a few days before dance competitions to give my daughter a good tan on stage. It works great as long as you apply with gloves. It does have a greenish foam (as other reported), but if you actually use it it works like a dream. I used it myself too and never had any issues. The only problem we had with it is that we had a dance competition at Disney and a lot of the solution sweat off of us and left us with splotches of tan. I can't really blame the product as much as the summer heat!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Graham

customer_reviews.title: Buy this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this product a few weeks ago and used it for the first time last night. I woke up this morning to a natural looking tan. I plan on doing it again tonight on my legs because I want a deeper tan on them. But I have to say, overall, I’m very impressed. It went on easy with a mitt and I had no orange or streaks! I will be using this all summer. I am so glad I tried this product!! Buy it! You will love it!!
customer_reviews.author: jason poland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Dries fast. Amazingly natural color.
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to give this a try but I’m glad I decided to go for it! I’m too afraid to tan in a tanning bed, 2 of my friends have serious skin cancer issues. I tried sunless tanning over 15 years ago and I ended up developing an allergy to it. If you develop red bumps and itch, you’re allergic to the DHA which is the active ingredient that tans you. So here I am 15+ years later and rocking a sunless tan. Looks so natural. People think I was somewhere warm! Dries quickly too. Didn’t stain my sheets which are light colored.
customer_reviews.author: Mme

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I kept buying much cheaper tanners but they either stunk or made me orange. My daughter said to try this and kept putting it off because of the price. I should have listened to her sooner. This stuff is amazing. Two pumps for the knee down on one leg then another two pumps for the knee up. Goes on smoothly and perfect color for me with just the one coat. I am very fair skinned and over 50. One bottle will last me all summer. Don’t wait like did. Get this stuff you will be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking, easy application, no smell 😍
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have tried MANY self tanners and have put this stuff to the test. It outbeats the $150 self tanner and I ALWAYS come back to this original one. Pro: it has a slight green when originally applying which I believe helps cancel any potential 'orange' look. No stinky smell, easy application, no streaks, natural looking (favorite benefit) Con: Can be pricey but well worth it. Make sure you exfoliate and moisturize the day before* Don't recommend shaving before you ever apply.
customer_reviews.author: TheGratefulMommy

customer_reviews.title: The color is so pretty and actually stays on!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have taken a before and after picture but I was so excited when I got it. I immediately showered, shaved, exfoliated (as they say to do before u apply) that I didn’t think to do a picture. The mit applies it evenly and my coloring is so good! (I’m pale and burn first, tan later in the summer). It actually stays on after a shower too! You can see the some comes off in the water but for the most part, it doesn’t wash away! Great product! Will re order for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Find this self tanner natural looking and easy to apply. I've used so many self-tanning products and do spray tans. I find this product and color look most natural. There is no bad streaking either. Use the glove and it applies well. I shower and moisturize the night before I apply. Like to apply tanner before bed. Just watch for knees, elbows and around feet. I use glove and apply to these areas last so there isn't so much product on the glove. You can see the color when you apply so sometimes I add lotion to my knees and around feet shortly after applying tanner for an even look.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Buyers BEWARE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mousse was a greenish color, which concerned me from the very beginning. I did a patch test and sure enough, about 5 hours later my skin was as green as ever. I would avoid this product!
customer_reviews.author: Big Poppa

customer_reviews.title: St. Tropez VS Loving Tan
customer_reviews.text: I have always used and liked Loving Tan but didn't like the light orange tint it turned as it wore off. I have fair skin and the Loving Tan dried SUPER fast but had a slightly odd smell. Then I used St. Tropez. WOW! It took a little longer to dry, has a little transfer onto my clothes but does not fade patchy like the Loving Tan. If you wasb it off in the morning after applying at night...no problems. It also doesn't "stick" to my sun spots like Loving Tan did and NO ornagy tint..ever! It fades naturally and not patchy and is easy to apply and no streaks. I'm sold on St. Tropez. Helllooooo Summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I highly recommend getting a glove and a small brush for areas like your toes and fingers. It can streak if you don't pay attention to the application. However, its not that dark that someone would notice. I am fairly medium skinned and it gives me a darker tan. I get compliments on it all the time or people asking me where I just went on vacation. It does have a smell to it. However, I personally enjoy the smell. So it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and produces a beautiful color! I’m super pale (like, reflective) and it looked natural on me. The only downside is the scent.
customer_reviews.author: ahenry

customer_reviews.title: Changed the formula-terrible!
customer_reviews.text: They have definitely changed the formula-bummer! The color is there but does NOT dry! Stays wet and sticky plus it 100% comes off in the shower the next day with hot water. Not purchasing again, not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not Orange
customer_reviews.text: It's lovely to find something that doesn't turn my skin orange. I will say, I have to apply two days in a row to get a natural looking sun-kissed tan. And that only lasts 2-3 days before it's completely gone. Yes, I follow the exfoliate and moisturize instructions. Having to apply 2 days in a row, with only 3 days in between, this bottle will barely last a few weeks. So it's worth it if you're going on vacation or have an event but if you want a long lasting regular use product, this will be an investment, so I guess you choose if it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Greenish mousse leaves a Trumpish tan
customer_reviews.text: The effect is... orange. Not healthy. As always when putting on a tanning product, I exfoliated and waited a few hours before application on dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Beverlina

customer_reviews.title: No sun no problems
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed at first I loved this stuff I thiught I finally found a product that work I didn’t wanna use a lot because a little goes a long way it’s foam just after a week it became to smell so bad I couldn’t even use it anymore I loved the product but I guess it was old maybe next time I do not going in the sun at all I’m like a porcelain doll So I NEED something like this product I definitely would love to try it again other then the product being old I would recommend it to people like me (no sun) and people that wanna keep up with that perfect spray tan
customer_reviews.author: brittany taylor

customer_reviews.title: I GIVE IT A C+
customer_reviews.text: St. Tropez Tanner used to be a much better product: #1 You MUST vigorously shake the bottle until you feel no fluid moving before you dispense it. Otherwise the liquid goes EVERYWHERE. Not a pleasant experience. #2 Obtaining a thin, even spread takes a comparatively long time. If you don't get it spread evenly, it looks like brown war paint. PRO'S Color lasts for approximately four days When spread evenly, gives fair skin a nice, natural tan
customer_reviews.author: Maté Afficionado

customer_reviews.title: For over $40 I had high expectations, it did not live up
customer_reviews.text: Reviews I read said this product has no tanning lotion smell, is not orange streaky and if you use the glove goes on easily. I used the glove and found none of these things to be true. It came off on my sheets, it was orangish and it smells like a tanning lotion. For this price I expected a lot more. I can get these results from a $10 version.
customer_reviews.author: SBraun

customer_reviews.title: Not odor free
customer_reviews.text: After many disappointments in self tanners, mostly due to the terrible "self tanner odor", I was told by a very enthusiastic beauty rep that I needed to try St.Tropez. It is advertised as having no self tan odor. So I bought the bronzing mousse and the applicator mitt and followed instructions. The smell is not unpleasant, at first. After about an hour, there it was! That horrible smell! I thought "well, what do you expect" and waited until the next morning to shower it off as suggested. Nope, its still there! The smell! ...sigh... Nice color though and it blends evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self-tanner I've ever used, and I've tried a lot of them. A subtle change of color, and no rub off on even white clothing or my sheets. Easy to apply, and it's definitely worth the price. I used to use Jergens Natural Glow. Even though it's a lot cheaper, it's not nearly as good as the St. Tropez. Be sure to use an exfoliator first, that seemed to really help. I used Tree Hut Shea Sugar Scrub, Coconut Lime, also sold on Amazon. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Diana55

customer_reviews.title: used it 5 times i was so orange!! ...
customer_reviews.text: used it 5 times i was so orange!!!!!! comet could not remove it from my skin...no thank u didnt like
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I am the fairest, whitest Irish ancestry, pale person you've ever seen. I am that friend that everyone jokes about being pale and pretty much any tanner has turned me orange and wonky. This stuff is AMAZING. I look naturally tan, no streaks, etc. Only con is that it does wear pretty easily but I also exercise daily and I think that's a pretty big contributing factor. It will also transfer to your sheets before you wash it off so keep an eye on that! But overall I will keep buying this stuff forever. It is well worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: Great color. New go to tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I was a diehard Fake Bake user but recently not having as much luck with it. Not sure if the formula was changed? I have to say, this gave me a wonderful natural tan color. Not orangey at all. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: cpapa30

customer_reviews.title: Great Self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and results within an hour. Great floral scent, doesn’t have the self tanner smell as other products do. Be sure to let the product dry before getting dressed or will get on your clothes, avoid whites or light colored clothing after application. Be sure to use application mit for the product will turn your hands orange. I didn’t wash my mit after the previous application and the palm of my hands turned a little green, but came off with soap & water. There are self tan remover products if one fears turning too dark, Orange, or even green :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Goertz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about this ages ago! The smell is ok and after a few hours I don’t notice it unless I sweat or get my skin wet. I haven’t noticed any transfer and like that it has a green tint for applying but also feel that lessens the orange effect. The mitt is a must and definitely rub rub rub. I do circles and up and down. I use it twice a week and very happy with results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Even Color—So Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Mousse. I’ve recently tried my airbrush and bought the special attachments and color —nope—streaky. Sprays-nope. This mousse with a mitt. —yes yes yes. I fell broke my finger and sprained my ankle. Awful bruises on my pale skin. I got to wear shorts today after I used this! It was seamless. I will use this the rest of the summer now. The color looks natural and I’m very fair. Follow the rules: rub a little moisturizer over your knees and feet, heels. If I wasn’t in a hurry to do it today. I’d definitely exfoliate the night before!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to preface this by saying I NEVER EVER do reviews, but this product deserves a review. I have been self tanning for almost 20 years and I’ve used every lotion, spray, gel, mousse and towel that are out there. This is the best I’ve ever used. I have super white, pasty skin and this self tanner gets me super tan without even a hint of orange. It almost looks hunter green going on but I think that’s why it never looks orange. It always looks super natural and not streaky at all. I will buy this over going to any tanning salon any day from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P

customer_reviews.title: The tanner I always go back to
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of st tropez products, and this is my favorite. because of the bronzer in the foam, it's easy to see where you have applied it and avoid streaking. It looks natural and even when dried. You do still have to go very light around the ankles and knees as it continues to get darker throughout the day and those are the areas it'll show, but that's the same with any self tanner. There is a scent to it, but it's not overly powerful and fades after the first shower. It dries quickly and I haven't noticed it run off on clothes or sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Danko

customer_reviews.title: Best self-tanner out there!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using St. Tropez for a couple years now, and it's the best self-tanner I've ever tried. It's basically foolproof, and has a natural glow. You don't need a lot in order to get an even glow, or apply more for a darker tan. I highly recommend getting the applicator mitt, as well!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Something is very wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have happily used this product for years. Yesterday I received my latest supply and shook well before using. It came out of the can olive green! It has always been a bronze color. I stupidly used it anyway and my legs look awful. Afraid to reorder so I am returning. .Expired????
customer_reviews.author: designergal1

customer_reviews.title: Overall great self tanner
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest and best self tanner that I have tried. Although scent is not wonderful, it is not as strong as others I have used. This is easy to spread and the color makes it easier to tell which areas you have covered. Leaves a natural color. Works better using a tanning mitt (still be sure to wash hands after applying), I tried using a fluffy make up brush after watching a YouTube video but I do not recommend applying this way.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Awful packaging awful smell
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived and the can was gross. There was some gooey stuff attached to the top, which then was on the packaging of the st tropez mitt I bought. I was really excited to use this product as my friends recommended it. But I then tried to spray some on to my mitt (I got past the goo) and the smell was awful and the stuff definitely went bad, as it was an awful green color and was not scent free as everyone raves about. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Doran

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this product. I followed the directions exactly. It was really easy to apply and to see where you missed a spot because it is tinted. ( don’t buy the glove- it’s really cheap and tore on first use) now left the product on for 6 hours then showered and I see no results. Super bummed. I may try again and leave it on over night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this was a fake bad product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using self tanner’s for a really long time. I’ve used many different brands. This one sunk into my pores and gave me black dots. In addition parts of my body turned very orange. It was also super hard to scrub off. Would not use again.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT but I am sad it broke open in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th bottle I’ve purchased, I am as pale as they come.... LOL this is the only tanner that I am able to use without turning orange. It makes me a nice golden bronze color and I’m so in love with it! It is so good to swim and activities... I am just so sad because my bottle came and it was cracked and all over in my envelope... :( I wish I could get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: What color guide?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if what I received was old but the color guide was worthless. I could see it on my first pat to the thigh to the skin but after that, I did not see a color to guide me down the rest of the leg. I winged it! I wasn't sure whether to give this a 3 star or a 4 star because of this selling point. The product did work for the color I wanted (just a slight change in skin tone) but I'm not sure about using this for a nice tan without using half the bottle! I'll be trying another tanning product for less money before re-ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: nancie price

customer_reviews.title: Best Tanner I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I started using this last summer before my brother's wedding. The color applies evenly and stays on well. It dries fast so you need to apply it with a little speed. Using a tanning mitt is best. It has a slight tanner smell to it but it's the best one I've found so far. I shower the night before and exfoliate, then apply and let dry in the A.M. and rinse off in the evening. It hasn't stained my clothing or white bedding. It lasts in water fairly well as long as you don't rub on it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Safe for Beginners.. super hard to mess up.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh. Do yourself a favor and get this product, don’t even bother getting the face self tanner.. just put this on your face too. Do get the application mit, and do get the prep lotion. It says streak free.. and it means it! After putting in on I was a nervous wreck I felt I didn’t do it good enough but once I washed it off 4 hours later it was flawless. After applying it to my face I was super nervous it might be too dark.. but once I washed it off I looked like I was on the beach for the day. Absolutely flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Paige A Richards

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, natural color
customer_reviews.text: Great beautiful, natural and instant color. I used it with the mitt and it was streak-free. As soon as it dries, you're good. I sat on my couch and put my clothes on and it didn't rub off, and when I showered the next morning there was no color rinsing off like I've found with Jergens and similar brands. Dries within a few minutes of application.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for the past 5yrs. The mousse is by far the most natural of all types of tanners out there. St. Tropez particularly in my experience applies the best, lasts me about 4 days with showing daily, and fades naturally. I apply with a mit all over body as well as face after I shower in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: SMplicity

customer_reviews.title: DEFECT, DO NOT WASTE MONEY ORDERING THIS PRODUCT!!!! COMES OUT GREEN
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand of self tanner before so I figured I’d order some more. Don’t get me wrong, this tanner is a great tanner. I loved how it made my skin look. Especially if you have very fair skin like me. I usually buy this tanner in store, but I decided to order it from amazon this time. My bottle came today and when I went to apply it, it came out GREEN. I would not risk buying this product because of this defect. I’m not happy either because this product is NOT cheap...I just wanted warn future buyers, and I hope this defect can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this through a giveaway I won at a boutique. I was worried about the orange look. To use this product make sure you scrub the day before very well and always always use a lotion that is made for self tanner. I use Hempz. When applying start on the legs then belly, back and then arms and neck. when going over knees and elbows and face use leftover product on mitt. I leave on when I go to bed and I wake up and take a shower and it applies nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good color - takes too long to dry
customer_reviews.text: Best I’ve tried yet (which is a lot of other products - a lot!!) ... but not perfect ... will rub off on your clothes and bedsheets ... takes at least an hour to fully dry after applying = lots of time w/o getting dressed!! And sheets= even after waiting several hours to go to sleep after putting this on ... i always wake up to both my pjs and sheets covered in brown and smelling like tanning lotion. Washes out ... but PIA.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great tanner!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Tanner I've ever had, and I've tried many different kinds. You MUST use a glove! This will definitely stain your hands if you don't. It absorbs fairly quickly. I usually give at least 10-15 minutes before getting fully dressed. It spreads nicely so when the color is fully developed it's more of an even tan. The smell is also more tolerable than most. I started using this because my dermatologist said that's what she uses. Definitely my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: This gave me allergic reaction over whole body. I should have done skin patch test first! Not for sensitive skin. I have used self tanning foams before and never had this problem. I will go back to neutrogena
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner yet and not Orange
customer_reviews.text: I am medium skin, blonde, green eyes. I have tried many self tanners that smelled awful and looked orange. I exfoliated and heavy moisturize esp around the knees and ankles. Same night I applied, It looks a disgusting green color out of the applicator so use gloves. I kept on overnight and was very tan. Just tan, not orange! If you don’t want overnight dark immediate tan, apply in am wash off after lunch. I used a towel on my pillow and wore sweats overnight did not stain anything. No smell either. I used on my face and body.
customer_reviews.author: Mako73

customer_reviews.title: Best self-tanning product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple self-tanning products but none even come close to the quality of St. Tropez. I have never had streaks or looked orange. I do use the mitt (bought separately) to apply the product which makes the application process cleaner. The color looks like a totally natural tan! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sleeper

customer_reviews.title: Works very well - USE precaution
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tanner. However, it stains all your clothes. If you do plan on using this product, use old dark clothes you don't mind getting stained and whatever you do, DONT sleep without washing off. I did and I woke up and my white sheets were bright orange. It is a realistic tan look - just know it works very very well, so watch your knuckles and toes.
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Mark

customer_reviews.title: first application great but beware of splotchy spots as it wears off
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the foam upon initial application. I got a nice even tan all over, even on my face. Where I ran into issues was with the 2nd and 3rd application. The color doesn't wear away evenly so you will get splotchy in certain areas as time goes. I hoped with another application things would even out but unfortunately it simply made the dark spots darker. So now before I reapply, I have to wait until the last application wears off completely. As I mentioned, first application was great but wait for further applications.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, natural color, and almost no smell. I use blue nitrile gloves instead of a mitt. The instant brown glow makes it easy to see areas you’ve missed. It’s definitely in the top 3 tanners I like. Most important to me is the smell. This is so faint that I’m now a big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Green & very strong scent......
customer_reviews.text: My product was Green! Not brownish green, Very Green! I’ve purchased b4 from QVC & it was always brown. I applied anyways but the scent was soooo strong & overpowering that it gave me a headache so I had to wash it all off immediately & I returned it. Too bad since I used to really love it.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this awesome tanner
customer_reviews.text: This self tanner is amazing. I am pure with and always look orange when I self tan but this turned a beautiful golden brown. And it’s super easy to put on and even it it looks a little streaky it dries without steaks. I got the application mit and would recommend it. This is the first (of many tried) that looks natural and good. Even compared to a spray tan this is better. It’s expensive but It seems like it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Drme

customer_reviews.title: Product is green and doesn't develop as well.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time purchasing this item on Amazon. I think the product must be beyond the shelf life date because the product looks green. When I tried the first product it was green. The green color didn't last, however, the tan didn't develop as well either. I've never experienced this issue when I've purchased the product in a store. Also notice the bottle itself has a picture depicting a 12 month shelf life. I think this must be older product?
customer_reviews.author: Breezy925

customer_reviews.title: Fades fast, very drying and stains
customer_reviews.text: Produces a nice color but super drying! It lasts about 3 days and fades quickly. I'm so not happy that it runs off on everything. It says it doesn't stain but I have shirts that prove otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Boston1

customer_reviews.title: Best option for a great tan
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times. The tan is always consistent and lasts longer than any other I have tried. I refuse to do the machine spray because the fade is always horrible. I gave always loved how this product fades and will continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Laughead

customer_reviews.title: Great Tanner
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because.. who isn't when it comes to "self tanner". This product had great reviews on sephora and here so I decided to try it. The smell, not so great. Also when it first goes on it's a greenish color BUT after it sinks in it looks great! I use the not and I highly recommend that. There color is a nice shade even in me (I'm so white). Even my husband noticed without me telling him what I was using and he liked it 😁
customer_reviews.author: dollofsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and skin
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product! It got great reviews and I thought I had found the best self tanner and for not a lot of money. However, I’m extremely disappointed! I watched the video beforehand and applied as instructed, but ended up orange and streaky. Luckily, it only lasted about three days. I never write negative reviews, but felt like I needed to write a true review.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Very orange color-not tan
customer_reviews.text: Very orange color. It went on smooth and stained skin well almost instantly with no streaks. The color was not bronze or tan but orange-yellow and did not improve as the day went on. I got busy and about 6 hours later I washed my legs with a cloth trying to get it off and most did scrub off. The next day with another scrubbing it was gone or at least not noticeable any longer. Will not be using it again! Total waste of $30!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Daigneault

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a decent amount of self tanners. This one does create a beautiful natural look, except the hands and the feet always turn orange. The smell is terrible after it drys. It does rub off on bras, and clothes even days later, and came off in the tub. I sent it back because for $45 it was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rosas

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I was so pale before and this gave me a nice little glow. So easy to apply! I did it all by myself including my back. Make sure to exfoliate 24 hours before, and moisturize dry areas like elbows, knees, etc. I was afraid I’d have streaks or blotchy areas but I do not. It’s also not orange whatsoever!. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: vero

customer_reviews.title: Dries quickly; that’s good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I tried a small test patch with a small amount and loved the results. The patch was touch dry in less than a minute! The color was subtle and natural looking. The next day when I tried to do my entire legs, I had a different realization. Drying quick meant I had to move quickly too! And I was not fast enough and ended up with streaks. I love the product enough that I’m not giving up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a self tanner expert. I tried this after trying a horrid store tanner that was orange and streaky. This turns darker overnight and the color is beautiful! It's a lovely brownish hue with absolutely NO orange at all. It's very easy to use, but make sure you're covering everything. I accidentally left an area around my knees undone and it was very obvious (lol).
customer_reviews.author: CrabbyChic70

customer_reviews.title: L. O. V. E
customer_reviews.text: ok I have been self tanning for years and this has been by far my favorite product to date! Love it way more than coco & eve. The undertone is perfect for my naturally light complexion and the color is buildable and bendable which is nice compared to some mouse tanners that leave you with harsh lines on your hands and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis W

customer_reviews.title: Good self-tanner, but smelly after a few hours of initial application.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product promptly and well packaged. It is easy to apply using a mitt. The initial scent is of a subtle fragrance, but after a few hours of initial application you can really smell the "self tanner odor". It though goes away once you rinse off and the color is pretty. I'm keeping the product because I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Clalumelia

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, not like my other St. Tropez tanners
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this from stores and used this many times in the past. This is beyond ash and is more of a green. Not sure if this was an old bottle or what.
customer_reviews.author: LindaMRK

customer_reviews.title: If you’re afraid of self-tanning, look no further
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a product like this and I was so worried about streaks or turning orange. I got this product to cover my pasty skin before vacation. The first time I applied it, I did one layer, as I wanted to see how it would turn out. I liked the look so much that the next time, I applied it twice to strengthen the effects. I am so happy with this! My one recommendation would be to definitely get some sort of applicator glove like the company says. (I did not heed the warnings, and my hands were darkened a bit) This stuff is fantastic and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Love this self tanner. I bought the recommended mitt and it makes all the difference. No tanner on my hands and it really helps to spread the product evenly. The color on the tanner is also great! No orange color. It dries quickly after it is applied and smells good also. I apply at night before going to bed and shower on the morning with a great color developed. I have applied in the morning and thought by the end of the day it had a little of that “tanner” smell but it was not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great on legs, but arms are another story!
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 5 stars because it did a great job on my legs. So after that successful attempt, I applied to my arms. The next morning I woke up to a complete breakout. My arms were covered in red bumps! I'm not typically one to have sensitivities to lotions or other skin care items (only to certain deodorant), but this was terrible! I will probably still use the remaining bottle for my legs though since I did not have any bad reactions on them. My only recommendation is to test on various parts of your body first, before fully committing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Self Tanner Odor
customer_reviews.text: Don’t believe anyone who says this mousse has no “self tanner” odor. It has one and it’s terrible! You may not smell it right away but when it dries, it’s pretty gross and embarrassing. With that being said, it does tan you and yes, it looks natural. The strong odor is lessened after a shower but I can’t describe just how overwhelming it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Adams

customer_reviews.title: Freakin awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and just now tried it... L O V E it so much!! Glides on smooth and really no streaking! My face has a nice tan glow to it too! I like how I can apply more depending on how dark of a tan I want... also it dries pretty quickly. I used an exfoliating body wash before putting this on and it looks really good :)
customer_reviews.author: Simona

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Mousse comes out with a green tint and does not apply well. Does not give me that golden tan that I have been used to over the years. This is not a good product and a waste of money. Missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: It works better than I had expected. Gives a nice color and doesn't look orange. It lasts about 4 to 5 days. It leaves you a little sticky after applying but the color doesn't transfer onto clothes or bed sheets. I'd suggest using before bed due to the sticky feeling and washing it off in the morning. If you don't already have a Mitt to apply with DONT buy st. TROPEZ mitt it is terrible had a huge hole after just the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tan, but Stains Clothing Bright Pink!!
customer_reviews.text: This does give an even, natural looking tan when you exfoliate and apply with the mitt. All good on that front. HOWEVER, I used this for the first time about an hour before going to bed and woke up to my clothes and sheets stained bright pink. It says you can't wash it off your skin for at least 4-8 hours, yet it stains anything it touches horribly, even once completely dry. How on earth would you be able to use this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bronzer/self tanner. I bought the mitt that goes with it and it is super easy to use. It looks natural and doesn't smell bad like a lot of self tanners. It lasts about 4 days I have found, so I usually apply every other day to just keep the nice color. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Tans nicely. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Tans nicely. Easy to use. Go song with a nice scent but after a few hours if your body heats up gives off a scent that I do not like. Stays with you for about 24 hours. I've used Loriell tanning that goes on smelling nicely and does not leave this funny odor afterwards. If you are not sensitive to scents odors this would be great. So I give this a three star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was my first self tanner I’ve used and it was much easier than I was expecting. Not streaky and was only a little orange when I didn’t wipe it off my hands the first time. Lasts and wears well too. I was hoping for a darker color and even after a reapplication it just didn’t darken like I hoped. If you’re looking for just a little color this is great!
customer_reviews.author: KatieT

customer_reviews.title: Clears up my skin too
customer_reviews.text: It does have a slight odor. But I have a strong able of smell, and this is still one of the best products that I've tried. That is the only reason for losing a star. I did want to mention that every time I use this on my face, my face acne clears up. ... I find that odd, but wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: TrackDoll

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin but this product is perfect! I did not buy the application mitt (due to reviews) so I just use latex surgical gloves. So easy to apply. My only complaint is that the scent lingers for quite a while (like a fake-tan smell) and it takes a long time to fully dry. I used to use "tan towels" but this will be my go-to tanning product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: barney

customer_reviews.title: Very natural tan.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried MULTIPLE self tanners before in my life. This is by far the absolute BEST out there. No orange color whatsoever. Beautiful tan color. And does not go on streaky. I did use an applicator mit. The photo was only after one use and I have very fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA STALEY

product_meta.title: St. Tropez Self Tan Bronzing Mousse, 8 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
This lightweight mousse delivers an instant bronze glow that dries in 60 seconds and after 4-8 hours, develops into a long-lasting tan. Infused with eco-cert approved DHA (an all natural tanning agent), St. Tropez delivers a perfectly natural looking, streak-free tan that fades evenly. Tan lasts for up to 10 days. Vegan Friendly Formula

BRAND STORY
By St. Tropez
